sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; class Form extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleChangeForm = this.handleChangeForm.bind(this); this.handleGenderForm = this.handleGenderForm.bind(this); } handleChangeForm(ev) { this.props.handleChange(ev); } handleGenderForm(ev) { this.props.handleGender(ev.target.value); } render() { return (
